title: Need help identifying this calligraphic script
content:
I'm going crazy trying to identify this calligraphic script font that was used on a wedding invitation! A couple examples are below.  
I think Champion or Champignon comes close but not exact.

Thanks in advance for your help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018222034im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-06-19%20at%2020_3474.10.11.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018222034im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-06-19%20at%2020_6472.17.05.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018222034im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-06-19%20at%2020_6220.23.00.png)
author: tritaratops

comments.content:
This is just an interim answer. [Parfumerie Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018222034/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesenses/parfumerie-script-pro/) is very close in style but I was not able to find exact matches for the letters. Although they may be buried in the alternates. Perhaps this script is from a designer that does not sell through MyFonts.  
Don
